definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Filial piety is one of the moral creams in Chinese traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 孝，是中国传统文化的道德精义之一。

sentences.english: In modern society the right-oriented doctrine is the soul of the system.
sentences.chinese: 在现代社会，权利本位是贯穿整个系统的精义。

sentences.english: THAT IS THE DIFFERENCE and THAT is what WWII combativesis really all about.
sentences.chinese: 差别就在这里，这就是二战格斗术的所有精义所在。

sentences.english: That the Sermon on the Mount contains the sum and substance of Christianity.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣登山训众论福所讲的一切包含了基督教的精义。

sentences.english: This seems to be, in many ways, the essence of his teaching.
sentences.chinese: 从很多层面看来，这看似他讲学的精义所在。

definition: the gist (of a text or argument)/the main points
gate to enlightment (Buddhism)/Buddhism/way/method/(old) south gate of a palace
doctrine (esp. religious)/argumentation (in a speech or essay)
profound theory/philosophical theory of Wei and Jin 玄學|玄学 sect
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
to comprehend (the nature of things etc)/to achieve enlightenment
Daoist School of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC), based on the teachings of Laozi or Lao-tze 老子[Lao3 zi3] (c. 500 BC-) and Zhuangzi 庄子 (369-286 BC)
